remarks: Specialization, with additional weakening (compared to ~ sp ) to allow bundling of ` x ` and ` y ` .  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-Aug-2017.)
statement:
spimfw.1 $e |- ( -. ps -> A. x -. ps ) $.
spimfw.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
spimfw $p |- ( -. A. x -. x = y -> ( A. x ph -> ps ) ) $.
